languages.text: {n}Гибкая фигура эльдарки застыла в неестественной позе средь мигающих люменов и танцующих теней мостика. Руки сомкнуты в незнакомом жесте, глаза плотно закрыты, а грудная клетка недвижима — словно Ирлиэт и не дышит вовсе.{/n}

{n}Yrliet's lithe form stands frozen in an unnatural pose amid the blinking lumens and dancing shadows of the bridge. Her hands are clasped together strangely and her eyes are tightly closed. Her chest is utterly still as if she is not breathing at all.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Гибкая фигура эльдарки застыла в неестественной позе средь мигающих люменов и танцующих теней мостика. Руки сомкнуты в незнакомом жесте, глаза плотно закрыты, а грудная клетка недвижима — словно Ирлиэт и не дышит вовсе.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet's lithe form stands frozen in an unnatural pose amid the blinking lumens and dancing shadows of the bridge. Her hands are clasped together strangely and her eyes are tightly closed. Her chest is utterly still as if she is not breathing at all.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet's lithe form stands frozen in an unnatural pose amid the blinking lumens and dancing shadows of the bridge. Her hands are clasped together strangely and her eyes are tightly closed. Her chest is utterly still as if she is not breathing at all.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}La esbelta figura de Yrliet está muy quieta en una postura antinatural entre los titilantes lúmenes y las sombras danzarinas del puente de mando. Tiene los ojos cerrados y ambas manos juntas de manera extraña. Su pecho está completamente inmóvil, como si ni siquiera estuviese respirando.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's lithe form stands frozen in an unnatural pose amid the blinking lumens and dancing shadows of the bridge. Her hands are clasped together strangely and her eyes are tightly closed. Her chest is utterly still as if she is not breathing at all.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La esbelta figura de Yrliet está muy quieta en una postura antinatural entre los titilantes lúmenes y las sombras danzarinas del puente de mando. Tiene los ojos cerrados y ambas manos juntas de manera extraña. Su pecho está completamente inmóvil, como si ni siquiera estuviese respirando.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}ブリッジの点滅する光と揺れる影の中で、ユリエットのしなやかな体が不自然な姿勢で固まっている。彼女の手は不思議な形に組まれていて、目はきつく閉じている。胸はまったく動いておらず、まるで呼吸をしていないかのようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's lithe form stands frozen in an unnatural pose amid the blinking lumens and dancing shadows of the bridge. Her hands are clasped together strangely and her eyes are tightly closed. Her chest is utterly still as if she is not breathing at all.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ブリッジの点滅する光と揺れる影の中で、ユリエットのしなやかな体が不自然な姿勢で固まっている。彼女の手は不思議な形に組まれていて、目はきつく閉じている。胸はまったく動いておらず、まるで呼吸をしていないかのようだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特僵硬地站在闪烁的流明灯投下的阴影中，优美的身形姿势很是不自然。她的双手古怪地交叠在一起，双眼紧闭，胸口几乎没有起伏，仿佛根本没在呼吸。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's lithe form stands frozen in an unnatural pose amid the blinking lumens and dancing shadows of the bridge. Her hands are clasped together strangely and her eyes are tightly closed. Her chest is utterly still as if she is not breathing at all.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特僵硬地站在闪烁的流光灯投下的阴影中，优美的身形姿势很是不自然。她的双手古怪地交叠在一起，双眼紧闭，胸口几乎没有起伏，仿佛根本没在呼吸。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}La silhouette élancée d'Yrliet est figée dans une posture singulière au milieu des lumens clignotants et des ombres dansantes de la passerelle. Ses mains sont étrangement jointes, ses yeux sont fermés et sa poitrine est totalement immobile, comme si elle ne respirait pas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's lithe form stands frozen in an unnatural pose amid the blinking lumens and dancing shadows of the bridge. Her hands are clasped together strangely and her eyes are tightly closed. Her chest is utterly still as if she is not breathing at all.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La silhouette élancée d'Yrliet est figée dans une posture singulière au milieu des lumens clignotants et des ombres dansantes de la passerelle. Ses mains sont étrangement jointes, ses yeux sont fermés et sa poitrine est totalement immobile, comme si elle ne respirait pas.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliets ranke Gestalt steht in einer unnatürlichen Pose eingefroren zwischen den blinkenden Lumens und tanzenden Schatten der Brücke. Ihre Hände sind eigenartig verschränkt, ihre Augen fest verschlossen. Ihre Brust ist vollkommen still, als würde sie gar nicht atmen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's lithe form stands frozen in an unnatural pose amid the blinking lumens and dancing shadows of the bridge. Her hands are clasped together strangely and her eyes are tightly closed. Her chest is utterly still as if she is not breathing at all.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliets ranke Gestalt steht in einer unnatürlichen Pose eingefroren zwischen den blinkenden Lumens und tanzenden Schatten der Brücke. Ihre Hände sind eigenartig verschränkt, ihre Augen fest verschlossen. Ihre Brust ist vollkommen still, als würde sie gar nicht atmen.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet'in esnek bedeni, köprüdeki yanıp sönen lümenler ve dans eden gölgeler arasında, olağan dışı bir konumda donakalıyor. Elleri tuhaf bir şekilde kenetlenip gözleri de sıkı sıkıya kapanıyor. Göğsünde en ufak bir hareket bile görünmüyor, âdeta nefes dahi almıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's lithe form stands frozen in an unnatural pose amid the blinking lumens and dancing shadows of the bridge. Her hands are clasped together strangely and her eyes are tightly closed. Her chest is utterly still as if she is not breathing at all.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet'in esnek bedeni, köprüdeki yanıp sönen lümenler ve dans eden gölgeler arasında olağan dışı bir konumda donakalıyor. Elleri tuhaf bir şekilde kenetleniyor ve gözleri sıkı sıkıya kapanıyor. Göğsünde en ufak bir hareket bile görünmüyor, âdeta nefes dahi almıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
